98411.「刻印を刻まれし者よ……。: You who are engraved with the mark...

98412.「我が主に 捧げられし者よ。\n 貴様の命……もらい受けに来た！:
You who are marked by our Lord. We have
come... to take your life!

98413.ブラッドメイジたちとの戦いに\n勝利した <cs_pchero>は\n元の宝箱の:
Having won the battle against the Blood Mages,
<cs_pchero> returned to the treasure
chest.

98414.しかし 突然 めまいに おそわれ\n意識が 遠くなっていく……。:
However, they were suddenly struck by
dizziness and lost consciousness...

98415.「我の定めし 供物よ…… \n 我がもとへ 来るがよい……。:
Come, my chosen offering...
Come to me...

98417.<cs_pchero>は 気を取り直して\nアクターのカギを使って 宝箱を開けた:
<cs_pchero> pulled themselves together
and used the Actor's Key to open the treasure
chest.

98418.宝箱の中には\n極意書の最終巻が 入っていた。:
Inside the treasure chest contained the
Creed Final Volume.

98419.<cs_pchero>は\n極意書の最終巻（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me:
<cs_pchero> received
the Creed Final Volume (Key Item)!<me 60>

98421.「今 キミの存在が こっちに近づいてるおかげで\n こうして 出てくることができ:
Now that your presence is closer, I'm able to
pop up like this. What I mean is, your life's
in danger, but...

98422.「あんまり自覚なし？ ノンキなもんだよなー。\n まっ その方がキミらしくて 面:
Not really aware of what's going on, huh? Just
as nonchalant as ever. Well, that's more like
you, anyways. We have this chance to talk.

98423.「キミは覚えてる？ ボクの果たせなかった夢を。\n それは アストルティア最大の:
Don't tell me ya don't remember? My
unfulfilled dream? To win the World Goofball
Grand Prix, the biggest in Astoltia!

98424.「そのためにも ボクは\n 伝説の『アクター極意書全５巻』を手に入れて\n 実力:
To do that, I needed to get my hands on the
legendary five volumes of "Actor's Creed" and
hone my skills.

98425.「そしたら あのピリッポが先に\n 極意書を全巻集めて 読んじゃった！\n 前と:
That's when that Pirippo guy went ahead and
read all of those books! He's gotten a lot
more clever than he was before.

98426.「それを見ていて\n ボクは…… ボクは……！: When I saw that, I... I...!!

98428.「ボクはかつて ピリッポとコンビを組んでいた。\n でも アイツは チャンピオン:
I used to work with him. But he always
compared himself to me, the champion at the
time...

98429.「自分のいいところを 伸ばそうとしなかった。\n だから コンビを解消したんだよ:
He didn't put in the effort to develop his
skills. That's why our little duo broke up.
He needed to be on his own.

98430.「ありがとよ。これからも オレは\n ありのままに かむぜ！\n ドリームズ か:
Thanks a bunch! I'll keep truckin' as I am.
Your dreams'll come true!!

98431.「あっはっは！ ケッサク！\n こんな天然モノ どこ探してもいないって。\n そ:
Ahaha! What a masterpiece! You won't find a
natural like him anywhere else. That's your
gist, Pirippo!

98432.「……ボクも そんな極意に\n たどり着いてみたかった。\n でも もう満足だ。:
I wish I could've done the same... but it
doesn't matter now. I'm satisfied.

98433.「ボクの夢は ボクも知らないうちに\n ピリッポが継いでくれてたんだって\n よ:
I now realize that Pirippo took over my dream
without me even knowing it!

98434.「ワールド演芸グランプリ優勝の夢は\n どうやら アイツが 果たしてくれそうだ。:
Looks like he'll be able to fulfill his dream
of winning the World Goofball Grand Prix...
One day, for sure...

98435.「……ムフッ。\n やっぱり 夢を語っちゃうとか\n そういうのって ちょっと:
Ahem... Sorry about that. Guess I'm a bit
nervous when I talk about my own dreams.

98436.「さーてと！ そろそろ ボクは行くよ。\n 今度こそ 心残りはない！\n 迷うこ:
Welp! I better get goin', then. And with no
regrets this time! No second thoughts!

98437.「サラバだ <pc>！\n キミの幸せを ずっと祈ってる。\n 笑いと涙にあふれ:
See ya, <pc>! I'll always be
wishing for your life to be filled with
happiness, laughter, and tears!

98439.「今 キミの存在が こっちに近づいてるおかげで\n こうして 出てくることができ:
Your presence is pretty close to me right now
so I'm able to just pop up like this. Your
life IS in danger, but...

98440.「あんまり自覚なし？ ノンキなもんよねー。\n まっ その方がキミらしくて 面白:
Not sure what's going on? You sure are
carefree, aren'tcha? Well, that's more like
you anyways. Gives us a chance to talk.

98441.「覚えてる？ アタシの果たせなかった夢。\n それは アストルティア最大の役者の:
You remember, right? My unfulfilled dream?
I wanted to win the World Goofball Grand Prix,
the biggest in all of Astoltia!

98442.「そのためにも アタシは\n 伝説の『アクター極意書全５巻』を手に入れて\n 実:
To do that, I had to find those legendary
five volumes of "Actor's Creed" and hone my
skills.

98443.「そしたら あのピリッポが先に\n 極意書を全巻集めて 読んじゃった！\n 前と:
But then Pirippo took it upon himself to get
all of the books and read them! I gotta say,
he's improved quite a lot.

98444.「それを見ていて\n アタシは…… アタシはね……！: When I saw that, I was... I was...!

98446.「アタシは昔 ピリッポとコンビを組んでたの。\n でも アイツは チャンピオンの:
Me and him used to work together. But he
always compared himself to me, the champ
at the time...

98447.「自分のいいところを 伸ばそうとしなかった。\n だから コンビを解消したのよ。:
He didn't want to work on developing his
strengths, so, I broke it off with him. I
wanted him to see himself as he truly was.

98448.「ありがとよ。これからも オレは\n ありのままに かむぜ！\n ドリームズ か:
Thanks a bunch! I'll keep truckin' as I am.
Your dreams'll come true!!

98449.「あっはっは！ やだ ケッサク！\n こんな天然モノ どこ探してもいないって。\:
Ahaha! What a masterpiece! You won't find a
natural like him anywhere else. That's your
gist, Pirippo!

98450.「……アタシも そんな極意に\n たどり着いてみたかったな。\n でもね もう満:
I wish I could've done the same... but it
doesn't matter now. I'm satisfied.

98451.「アタシの夢は アタシも知らないうちに\n ピリッポが継いでくれてたんだって\n:
I now realize that Pirippo took over my dream
without me even knowing it!

98452.「ワールド演芸グランプリ優勝の夢は\n どうやら アイツが 果たしてくれそうね。:
Looks like he'll be able to fulfill his dream
of winning the World Goofball Grand Prix...
One day, I know he will...

98453.「……なーんて<heart>\n キャー 言っちゃった！ 言っちゃった！\n 夢:
Yadda, yadda... <heart>
Eek! I talked too much! It's so embarassing
talking about my dreams!

98454.「さーてと！ そろそろ アタシは行こっかな。\n 今度こそ 心残りはないもんね！:
Weeelp! I think it's about time for me to get
going. And with no regrets this time! No
second thoughts either!

98455.「じゃあねー もうひとりの <pc>。\n キミの幸せを ずーっと祈ってるよ。\:
Bye bye, other <pc>. I'll keep
wishing for your life to be filled with
happiness, laughter, and tears!

101656.「キミには ずいぶん 世話になっちゃったね。\n これからは ボクのことは 気に:
You've helped me so much. From now on, I want
you to do stuff your own way and not worry
about me anymore.

101657.「これは ボクからの ほんの気持ちだ。\n いつか きっと 何かの役に立つはずだ:
This is just a little something from me. I'm
sure it's gotta be useful for something.

101659.「キミには ずいぶん お世話になっちゃった。\n これからは アタシのことは 気:
You've been such a great help to me. From
now on, I want you to do what you need to do

101660.「これは アタシからの ほんの気持ち。\n いつか きっと 何かの役に立つはずだ:
